head.title: Error 404: File not found
head.keywords: BibleTime, Linux, unix, FreeBSD, cross platform, Software, biblestudy, bible study, God, Religion, Bible, devotional, crosswire, sword, file not found, error

section.title: The document is not available
section.para: The document you wanted to get is not available on www.bibletime.info. Please use the navigation tree on the left to see if the document was moved.
If you cannot solve the problem, please report the URL that failed to info@bibletime.info. Thank you very much!
